remarks: A centralizer expression for two sets elementwise commuting. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
cntzfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
cntzfval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
cntzfval.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` M ) $.
sscntz $p |- ( ( S C_ B /\ T C_ B ) -> ( S C_ ( Z ` T ) <-> A. x e. S A. y e. T ( x .+ y ) = ( y .+ x ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d B x $.
$d M x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
